video_title: Asia Rising: The Next Generation of AI Startups - SuperAI Singapore 2025
description:
Learn more about SuperAI: superai.com
Follow us on X: x.com/superai_conf

Panel: Asia Rising: The Next Generation of AI Startups

Speakers:
Hian Goh, Founder and General Partner @ Openspace
Aakash Kumar, Managing Director @ Z47
Bruce Yang, Co-Founder @ Sapiens AI

Moderator:
Hyunjin Kim, Strategy Professor @ INSEAD

Stage: io.net Main Stage
#superai #startups #asia #aistartups #nextgen 

Recorded on 19 June 2025
